entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Burlington
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:25 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 7.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burlington Lift Bridge 5:00 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Temperature: 7.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 70 %
Dewpoint: 1.9°C
Wind: SW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
